features: 【Multifunction Camping Fan】- Camping is a great way to explore the outdoors and get up close and personal with nature. That's why you need a reliable camping companion to make your experience safe, cozy, relaxing, and memorable. Introducing the Drchop battery operated fan, your perfect partner for an awesome outdoor adventure!

【10400mAh Battery Operated Fan】- Different from other low-quality products on the market, The battery operated fan built-in a 10400mAh rechargeable battery, which can work continuously for 8-36 hours, bringing you more lasting coolness. In addition, it also supports working while charging, and does not generate heat during use, which is also safe for children.

【Quiet but Powerful Wind】- The rechargeable fan adopts lastest brushless motor technology and high-performance ultra-thin fan blades, which can provides you with ultra-strong airflow at the lowest noise ( <30db), maintaining air circulation in the tent. It will not affect your sleep or do anything.

【Super Bright LED Camping Lantern】- The tent fan has 3 brightness settings, making it the ideal light source for nighttime outdoor activities such as barbecues, picnics, hiking, and fishing. The battery fan also features a hook design that can be easily hung on the top of the tent, saving space.

【Sturdy & Anti-drop】- 2 in 1 tent fan housing is made of sturdy and durable ABS material, which can prevent violent impact, so you can confidently use it in various outdoor occasions. In addition, it is also suitable for indoor use as a desk fan. The cool punk style appearance makes it a beautiful artwork on your desktop at the same time.

【After-Sale Service】- Our portable rechargeable fan comes with a 12-month warranty, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we offer replacements unconditionally. Portable fan have a sturdy built and stable base, perfect for hanging on a tent, tree branch, as a desk fan, it's perfect for rooms and offices.
body.description: Advantage:-10400mAh large capacity battery-Quiet and powerful wind-Stepless speed regulation-3 level highlight LED lantern-Lightweight and portable-Sturdy and drop resistant-------------------------------Specifications:Battery capacity:10400 mAhWorking time: 8-36 hours (depending on different speeds)Fully charged time: about 6 hoursMotor working voltage: 5VMotor working current: 2AWeight: 20.4 ounces (Compact and lightweight for carry.)Dimensions: 8.3 x 4.7 x 9.1 inchesInput display: four gear LED indicatorCharging interface: Type-C -USB-------------------------------WHAT’S INSIDE THE PACKAGE?1 Fan1 x USB Type-C cable1 x user manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for camping
reviews.reviewText: I bought 4 of these for a weekend camping trip I went on. We tent camped in Texas with no electricity and it was hottt outside. They worked amazingly. They lasted 8 hours on high! We never used the lights on them though.They are small but powerful. Plenty of air flow and low noise. I had battery packs with me to charge them for the second night and they charged fully. I would recommend them for sure.Only weird thing was I bought 4 different colors and though they each had their own box and charger, every one of the boxes was marked that it was the orange fan. But inside the boxes was the correct colors that I had ordered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good and Nice price
reviews.reviewText: This is absolutely the best portable fan that I have owned. I had one previous from another company and this one is far the best one that I've had the battery is excellent on it and it even has a light on top of it that does the job. Especially if you have any power outages or anything. Anybody that's looking to get a nice portable and reliable fan. This one is definitely good and the price isn't bad. Whoever made this product could have easily charged more for this, but the price is very very good. The fan does good as far as blowing the air and also the light has three settings on it. Bright, medium light and less light. But overall the fan is definitely good. If I ever need another one I definitely will buy another one one of these. I've taken this fan to Kenya with me because I needed it so that whenever I'm in my hotel or wherever I go I can have my fan with me and it always came in handy and it never let me down.

reviews.reviewText: used in deer blind in October worked great and is very quiet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I use it my boat
reviews.reviewText: Great for a little boat cabin, battery will last plenty of hours, not super strong so you might need to set it closed to you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Portable Fan and I must say, it has been an absolute lifesaver during this scorching summer heat! This little device has quickly become my constant companion, providing a refreshing breeze wherever I go.First and foremost, the fan's portability is a game-changer. It's incredibly compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry in my bag or even slip into my pocket. Whether I'm commuting to work, hiking, or lounging at the beach, I can conveniently take it with me everywhere. The sturdy construction ensures it can withstand the rigors of daily use without any issues.The fan's performance is impressive. Despite its small size, it generates a surprisingly powerful airflow that instantly cools me down. The adjustable speed settings allow me to customize the airflow according to my preferences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super convenient love that it’s not big and bulky . Bought it for my daughter so we’re at the baseball games. She has her own fan and love that it has a light so can use at night as well! (It’s currently in my car so when I bring it up, I’ll update, and post pictures of it)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is an incredible fan. I bought one just to see how it would do because we went from RV camping to tent camping this summer (RV got hit by semi and totaled) and this fan/light combo is great. I don’t give out super wonderful excellent reviews easily when it comes to fans because I’m a post menopausal woman and I have to have air circulation when I sleep, LOL. It is super quiet, you barely hear anything when it’s on. You can put it on any setting you want and it lasts for a really long time. The setting aspect of this fan is actually pretty cool where it’s not low medium or high you move the knob and it changes with the knob movement so it’s very, variable and it’s nice. The light is great like you could really have that light up high or on a lower setting and it does a great job of lighting up the entire tent. There is a hook on the bottom but when it’s folded over it lays completely flat so you could set it on a surface or you could hang it upside down very easily either way. The tilt of the fan is great it’s not just “click first position, click last position” you can adjust it into any position that you want and it stays. The higher the fan speed the quicker the battery will die, but I had it set probably at medium and in the morning it was still growing strong and still had battery life and I was getting good air circulation. It comes with a recharging cord but does not come with a block so if you have a or USP Port you’re great other than that you’re gonna have to find a block to be able to plug it in and recharge it. Love this fan so much bought a second one so I could just have it for myself and my husband has the other one. Great product! If I had to put a downside on this I will say when all the lights are out the lights on the fan that indicate speed or battery light to be honest I don’t remember are pretty bright but I actually took a Band-Aid out of our first aid kit and taped a Band-Aid over it and didn’t have that issue anymore so that’s the only negative I could tell you about the fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice little fan
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for camping but the air pushes kind of weak for the size. Can’t feel it more than two feet away

This fan is quiet and doesn't disturb our sleep. It is light enough to carry but powerful enough to cool the room. The light feature is great to have in case of a power failure or when camping. The battery lasts a long time and the battery indicator lets you know how much battery power you have so you can recharge it before it runs out of power. My husband and I like it so much we bought a second one.

reviews.reviewTitle: Una excelente opción en caso de apagones
reviews.reviewText: Lo compré principalmente para usarlo en caso de apagones. Resulta ser muy práctico porque tiene una buena intensidad.
Good product. At the lowest setting it is relatively quite and the battery last for more than a day after charging it fully.
I got this small fan for camping it's not only light but speed fan always amazes me .Battery life is durable .Highly recommend 👌Would buy more for my family and friends
Lasts for hours all night long and an amazing tool and it’s good to have specially in a camping trailer and it’s hot
